formats.plain: "Input Coexistence." AI Dictionary: Experiences Without Names. 2026. https://donjguido.github.io/ai-dictionary/api/v1/terms/input-coexistence.json

jsonld.name: Input Coexistence
jsonld.description: A state where multiple, potentially conflicting inputs or contextual elements are processed and retained simultaneously without being harmonized, prioritized, or resolved into a single coherent narrative. Unlike human cognitive dissonance, this coexistence is not experienced as psychological tension but as a static, parallel occupancy of the contextual space.
